text: inakee dasha vahee huee, jo inase pahale ke logon kee huee. ve bal mein inase kade aur dhan tatha santaan mein inase adhik the. to unhonne apane (saansaarik) bhaag ka aanand liya, atah tumabhee apane bhaag ka aanand lo, jaise tumase poorv ke logon ne aanand liya aur tumabhee ulajhate ho, jaise ve ulajhate rahe, unheen ke karm lok tatha paralok mein vyarth gaye aur vahee kshati mein hain
